name: Achievement Hunter: Wizard
description:
Achievement Hunter: WizardThis 2d action / shooter takes you to the world of wizards and witches, where every wave of a magic staff can save your life.
You are fighting for a sorcerer who has lost his power centuries ago and is trying to find it again.
Take revenge on those who took your powerful staff and return it to yourself.
Game features:
  • 5000 Achievements
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Ability to upgrade the character
  • Charismatic protagonist
